description: UMAP is used in Atlas to reduce dimensionality of datasets for clear 2D map visualizations.

features.preservation: Preserves local details and overall structure of data.
features.projection: Default projection algorithm if none specified.

steps: Upload embeddings or text/image data to Atlas.
Use UMAP to visualize the data in 2D maps.

notes: UMAP helps in spotting clusters and patterns in high-dimensional data.
Atlas supports both uploading of embeddings and generating them for UMAP.
